Question.Subject: Is there a site you can advertise stuff what are up for bidding free?
Question.Content: Without Using a credit card and in the UK I am looking to sell Mobile Phones and Gaming Disc and Accessories Like eBay but free Were other people bid and its Pay on collection
Question.ChosenAnswer:
www.ebid.co.uk
you can sign up sell your items for free and only pay a small fee if the item sells. ( It is a small fee as well, about 2% of the final sale fee. You can sell via auction or fixed priced format.
Basically it is the same as ebay but cheaper and you don't need a bank account.
